column4: can anyone tell me how to get flash working in firefox in Jaunty ?
I can install the version 10 but it says there is a later version in the software channels. I've yet to see that version though
get the tar.gz and extract the .so to ~/.mozilla/plugins
i will assume you use firefox like every other person
if you use 64bit, get the 64bit plugin
yeah i thought you used firefox
ive never had that thing work personally
oh then 32bit is easy peasy, the repo will do the work for you
use the repo and it WILL be for your release
